item.title: [Python] Device monitoring with IOS-XE On-box Python
item.description: ## Introduction When monitoring Cisco network equipment, you may want to see the results of show commands. This time, from the Guest Shell of IOS-XE, I would like to get the result of the show command using python and send it to Elasticsearch for visualization. About Guest Shell Guest Shell is a Linux container environment hosted on IOx, and is implemented in products such as the Catalyst 9000 series and ISR4000 series.
